system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Any
Tech-Use +10
Apt: Intelligence, Tech
system.descriptionText: Character makes +20 Tech-Use Test on wounded Servitor Comrade in Cohesion. If successful comrade can act as if not Wounded or Dead until the end of the encounter regardless of further damage. At the end of the Encounter character makes -20 Tech-Use Test, if successful Servitor becomes Wounded, if failed it dies from being overstrained.

description.value: Character makes +20 Tech-Use Test on wounded Servitor Comrade in Cohesion. At the end of the Encounter character makes -20 Tech-Use Test, if successful Servitor becomes Wounded, if failed it dies from being overstrained.
